data.title: The Heart Specialist
data.text:
The Heart Specialist (13-Sep-2006)

Original Title: Ways of the Flesh

Director: Dennis Cooper

Writer: Dennis Cooper

Based on a book: Sidney Zachary, MD (inspired by his tape recorded journal)

Original Music: Bud'da; Tree Adams; Christopher Faizi

Producers: David Getcahew-Smith; Kristin Overn; Dennis Cooper

Keywords: Comedy, Drama
